document.full_text: twitter will seek to notify its users so they can defend themselves before it hands over user information to the authorities, a senior manager said on wednesday when asked about a privacy dispute in britain.
document.title: twitter says to protect users' right to self-defense
lines_and_colors: twitter will seek to notify its users so they can defend themselves before it hands over user information to the authorities, a senior manager said on wednesday when asked about a privacy dispute in britain.
